unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Important for farmers like Ramlal in Rajasthan! Heard PMFBY payouts were delayed in 2023 though. Hope things improve. My khet suffered badly in the floods of 2021. Gotta protect our annadaatas. Applying on 10/10/2024. Maybe NABARD could simplify the process? Deadline 15/11/2024, 17:00 hrs! Hope the Rs.5000 premium is worth it this year. Fingers crossed after that 06:00 hrs puja on 20/10/2024! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Important for farmers like Ramlal in Rajasthan! Heard P M F B Y payouts were delayed in two thousand and twenty three though. Hope things improve. My khet suffered badly in the floods of two thousand and twenty one. Gotta protect our annadaatas. Applying on tenth october two thousand and twenty four. Maybe N A B A R D could simplify the process? Deadline fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four, five P M! Hope the rupee five thousand premium is worth it this year. Fingers crossed after that six A M puja on twentieth october two thousand and twenty four! Jai Kisan!
